name: Tenoctilan
description:
Tenoctilan is a short horror game about giving a piece of intel to your allies with a computer.
But there is a problem, and it's standing between the computer and you.

Be cautious to not drop the intel, you might have to pick it up with the SPACE BAR.    

If you are in danger, hide in lockers with E. 

Rocks might block your path,  clear your way with the SPACE BAR.

Sound Effects: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=khJ-xIb_c4g https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B0DS9DU47yo https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nUUVSxZ4ohI&   https://youtu.be/1ptnee_3WcE

Textures: https://cc0textures.com/
